pages.text: $(li)The Alligator Snapping Turtle is a semi-aquatic creature that can be found in the depths of the Swamp of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)This creature will attack anything that steps near it.$(br)$(li)Sometimes they drop a piece of Spiked Scute, you can use it to craft a $(l:patchouli:armors/spiked_turtle_shell)Spiked Turtle Shell$(/l) in a Crafting Table.
